sentence: My colleague was less persistent and she had to us the gym to take a shower a wholly inadequate solution in the circumstances
1 use of swimming pool and gym is not complimentary
The only thing that was slightly frustrating was the cost of using the gym facilities though it seemed like it was operated by another entity
The only negative thing is that you have to pay for amenities like the gym and the pool
breakfast choice limited for long stays fitness room too small and too expensive
The only hotel I have seen that you need to pay extra for Gym
Two warnings use of the gym and spa requires an extra fee for most room rates and the sushi restaurant while good is hideously expensive
Only surprise was that there was potentially a significant charge to using fitness center if room booked using Expedia
The gym is large with a decent array of equipment including the old school vibrating belt machine and a large white hypobaric chamber which I was explicitly told I could not photograph not sure why
Having to pay extra to use the gym is always an annoyance too I can not think of any other hotel I have stayed at in recent years that still pulls that one
Has all the necessary amenities on site restaurant options fitness center and pool nearby access to subway and convenience stores and centralized location
Good gym and Japanese sauna available for those who wishes to use
Standard room was very roomy and the gym completely equipped
We arrived very early but they arranged for us to have a shower in their gym health club facilities and had our room ready 2 hours earlier then usual
Comfortable beds and a well fitted spa
Pool and facilities wonderful really enjoyed the sauna and steam rooms No complaints
Great service nice hotel with a very good restaurant and spa amazing breakfast and near to two different metro station also walking distance from Ropongi
Elegant charming wonderful bed great amenities and spa with huge pool and onsen
The health club is well appointed with a swimming pool and sauna area
very good swimming pool gym sauna etc
